2 weeks ago - Conagra Brands, Inc. (formerly ConAgra Foods) is an American consumer packaged goods holding company headquartered in Chicago, Illinois. Conagra makes and sells products under various brand names that are available in supermarkets, restaurants, and food service establishments.

t: Exclusive: US food giants PepsiCo, Conagra seek to exempt some imports from tariffs, trade group says | Reuters
